{{Disambiguation}}
'''Baal''' is the {{w|Ars Goetia|Goetic}} name of [[Makoto]], the original [[Electro Archon]] who ruled over [[Inazuma]]. It may also refer to:
* [[Raiden Shogun]], the playable character
* [[Ei]], the current Electro Archon as well as Makoto's ''kagemusha'' and younger twin sister
* [[The Shogun]], Ei's puppet and ''kagemusha'' as well as the effective Electro Archon after her creation
